title: Suspect in Deadly Attacks on Homeless People in New York, D.C. Arrested
sub_head: Federal agents took suspect, responsible for at least five unprovoked attacks and two deaths, into custody early Tuesday morning in nation’s capital
body:
A suspect sought in connection with a string of shootings targeting homeless people in Washington, D.C., and New York City has been arrested, police said Tuesday.
Federal agents took the suspect into custody at around 2:30 a.m. ET Tuesday in the southeast part of the district and transported him to Washington’s Metropolitan Police Department, officials said.
